name: Love
description: I find it easy to be very understanding of people who criticize me and fail to live up to the standards I hold for them.

name: Joy
description: I find pleasure in most everything I do and I am content with all that God has given to me.

name: Peace
description: It is easy for me to forgive myself and others, and I am free from stress, anxiety, depression and fear.

name: Patience
description: I am quite capable of handling periods of suffering and pressure without becoming irritable or frustrated.

name: Kindness
description: I am quick to lend a hand when someone is in need or in trouble, expecting nothing in return.

name: Faithfulness
description: I maintain my commitments to and think highly of those in authority over me and those who depend on me.

name: Gentleness
description: I allow others to make mistakes without becoming withdrawn or angry when it is necessary to confront them.

name: Self-Control
description: I manage my time and finances well without the interference of addictive or immoral behavior.

name: Marital Situation
description: I am very content with my current marital situation, and I do not wrestle with any type of sexual immorality.

name: Immediate Family
description: I have excellent relationships with everyone in my immediate family and communicate with them regularly.

name: Finances
description: I view my finances and possessions as blessings from God, giving generously and spending wisely with no indebtedness.

name: Free-Time
description: I regularly take time for myself, engaging in activities that strengthen and refresh me rather than trying to escape.

name: Spiritual Formation
description: I actively welcome God into my home, set a godly example and encourage the faith of my family members.

name: Personal Development
description: I strive to learn new things and deepen my current pool of knowledge, encouraging my family to do the same.

name: Health
description: I have a healthy lifestyle in regard to diet, excercise, grooming, and cleanliness without and excessive preoccupation with them.

name: Hospitality
description: I welcome people to my home, using opportunity to strengthen and encourage them in life's journey.

name: Social Network
description: I have a solid group of friends who keep me accountable, encourage me and strengthen my relationship with God.

name: Relatives
description: All my relationships with my extended family and in-laws are vibrant and healthy. I enjoy spending time with them.

name: Tolerance
description: I have strong relationships with people who are quite different than me, and I do not wrestle with bias or bigotry of any kind.

name: Being Mentored
description: There are several people more experienced than me who personally influence my life on a regular basis.

name: Mentoring Others
description: I have a positive, personal influence on the lives of several people with less experience than me.

name: Compassion
description: I am generous with and quick to respond to the needs of my friends and family without expecting anything in return.

name: Receiving Criticism
description: I like to be challenged by my peers and am willing to accept criticism without lashing out or harboring bitterness.

name: Forgiveness
description: When I am hurt or offended, I am quick to confront the responsible person in love and do not speak ill of them to others.

name: Education
description: I am well-educated with regard to my work and I am continually learning and applying new information as it develops.

name: Gifts Match
description: My work is perfect match with my areas of giftedness. What I do for a living come rather natural for me.

name: Contribution
description: I thoroughly enjoy serving the people who benefit from the results of my labor. My work is a tremendous blessing to others.

name: Employee Relations
description: I have terrific relationships with everyone I work with regardless of their position. We are a team.

name: Empowerment
description: Whenever things are not going right, I am able to influence positive change without offending or ostracizing others.

name: Goals
description: I am motivated by compelling, realistic goals that stretch my abilities and challenge me to work with excellence.

name: Time Management
description: I work with diligence, completing my tasks in a timely manner, yet leaving sufficient time for other priorities in life.

name: Enjoyment
description: My work brings me satisfaction and enjoyment. I can not think of anything else I would rather be doing.

name: Respect
description: I am respected and well-liked by people in the community who know me. They like to spend time with me.

name: Neighbors
description: I know my immediate neighbors by name and have a good relationship with them. We enjoy living on the same street.

name: Civic Duties
description: I gladly fulfill my civic duties (i.e. voting, jury duty, paying taxes, school involvement) when I am called upon to do so.

name: Peacemaker
description: I am a peacemaker. I do not engage in conversation or behavior that denigrate people of other races, religions or cultures.

name: Charitable
description: When I see an individual or family in need, I am quick to give of my time and my resources to bless them.

name: Law Abiding
description: I am an exemplary citizen, refusing to engage in any kind of behavior that could get me in trouble with the law.

name: Positive Influence
description: I associate with several groups of people in the community and have a strong, positive influence in their lives.

name: Cultural Awareness
description: I spend time with diverse groups of people and have a good understanding of their various cultures and philosophies.

name: Discovery
description: I know what my various gifts and talents are and I am often encouraged by others to use them.

name: Stewardship
description: I freely use my talents and abilities for the benefit of others without expecting anything in return.

name: Practice
description: I regularly spend time sharpening my abilities and strengthening my skills so that I might perform with excellence.

name: Teachable
description: I continually seek out others who are more proficient than I am in order to learn from them and improve my talens.

name: Teaching Others
description: I can often be found helping others develop their gifts and talents and encouraging them to use them.

name: Cooperative
description: Whenever I use my talents and abilities in conjunction with other people, I am a team player. I am often asked back.

name: Humble
description: I am not overly concerned with receiving credit for my contributions, and I am content when others surpass my abilities.

name: Confident
description: When called upon to use my talents, I am confident that I can get the job done. I enjoy a good challenge.
